short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download YouTube thumbnails in 1080p, 720p, or 480p with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YT Thumbnail Downloader by Click is your go-to tool for quickly grabbing YouTube thumbnails in high resolution (1080p, 720p, or 480p) with just one click. Ideal for content creators and designers, this Chrome extension makes it effortless to capture and save thumbnails for offline use. Enjoy a smooth, user-friendly experience with the ability to download thumbnails from YouTube videos and Shorts effortlessly.
